Biography: Namboori Thakur Tilak Varma is an Indian international cricketer who plays for the Indian cricket team. A left-handed batsman and an occasional off-spin bowler, he plays for Hyderabad in domestic cricket and for Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League (IPL). He was a member of the Indian team that won the 2023 Asia Cup.

A left-handed batsman and an occasional off-spin bowler, he plays for Hyderabad in domestic cricket and for Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League (IPL). He was a member of the Indian team that won the 2023 Asia Cup.
